meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> swept away one of the <radical>cleat</radical>s your <radical>husband</radical> just bought and creates an entire <kanji>valley</kanji> with it.
readingMnemonic: When the water clears, you and your husband go to the <kanji>valley</kanji> to look for the cleat and instead you find a bunch of <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい)! Maybe this is the tsunami's way of saying, "Thanks for letting me steal your cleat so I could make this valley shortcut."
